nodes.text: The second sun of the Trymant system was one component of the binary star that the star system and all its planets, including Trymant IV, orbited. When an Emergence of the Great Hyperspace Disaster occurred in the system, Praknat 3, Trymant's closest moon, was struck by a piece of the Legacy Run's main hull, changing the gravitational balance of the entire system. Trymant IV was tilted closer to the second sun then it had ever been, resulting in an ecological catastrophe as all of its aboveground water sources were vapourized, turning it into a desert.
